price: Àwọn wọ̀nyẹn ni àwọn tí Allāhu tọ́ sí ọ̀nà. Nítorí náà, ọ̀nà wọn ni kí o tẹ̀lé. Sọ pé: “Èmi kò bi yín ní owó-ọ̀yà kan lórí rẹ̀. Kí sì ni al-Ƙur’ān bí kò ṣe ìrántí fún gbogbo ẹ̀dá.”
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَى ٱللَّهُۖ فَبِهُدَىٰهُمُ ٱقۡتَدِهۡۗ قُل لَّآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَجۡرًاۖ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna hadā al-lahu fabihudāhumu iq'tadih qul lā asalukum ʿalayhi ajran in huwa illā dhik'rā lil'ʿālamīna
